entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind light except west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Temperature steady near 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 18 January 2023
